comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1

every time i go to make a purchase on line i get the same problem with this sslclickbank payment page website can not be found -why does this happen & how do i fix it 

https://ssl.clickbank.net/order/orderform.html?time=1308942264&vvvv=7468656d6f6e6579696e&item=2&name=danny+pavia&emal=dpavia%40rogers.com&vvar=email%3Ddpavia%40rogers.com%26name%3Ddanny+pavia

Reproducible: Always


Actual Results:  
just click on the url link

Expected Results:  
same problem

the weblink should have taken me to the payment page i check with clickbank and they said the problem was not at their end and to contact firefox  regarding it- they said it had to do with their we-browser.

comments.text:
Is your Issue reproducible in Safe-Mode?
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode

Also, please do not use/link to (maybe) private sensitive Data to show your Issue.
